item.title: Francis Ford Coppola Set to Honor Warner Herzog During Venice Film Festival Opening Ceremony
item.description: Francis Ford Coppola has been recruited by the Venice Film Festival to deliver the so-called “Laudatio” speech honoring Werner Herzog during the event’s opening ceremony. As previous
